hero.name: Samriddha Samanta
hero.subtitle: Hi, my name is
typedStrings: I Am Native Android Developer with 4+ Years of Experience.
I Also Create Android/iOs Solution Using React Native,JavaScript & TypeScript.
Currently Solving Healthcare Problems of India with MyJio - JioHealth Sdk & JioHealth Hub Applications.

experience.title: SDE 1
experience.description: As part of the MyJio Mobile team, I actively contributed to the development and maintenance of the JioHealth Mini SDK App for MyJio (5M+ DAU, 150M+ MAU, 500M+ downloads) and the JioHealth App (1M+ downloads), optimizing features, improving performance, and reducing APK size. I worked on Clinick on the Go, an IoT-based smart healthcare app supporting 20+ medical tests like ECG, BP, SpO2, Dengue, and Malaria, showcased at IMC 2023 and 2024. Along with kotlin/java recently transitioned into cross-platform development using React Native, JavaScript, and TypeScript to deliver seamless Android and iOS experiences.

experience.title: Android Developer
experience.description: Designed and developed features for an OTT mobile app, integrating RESTful APIs and JSON-based web services.Ensured compatibility across multiple Android versions and devices, including smartphones and tablets, to deliver a seamless user experience.

projects.title: Compose Pokedex App
projects.description: Compose pokedex app is a small application based on modern Android application tech-stacks and MVVM architecture.This project is focusing especially on the new library jetpack compose which is a new way of making design/layouts for android apps.Also fetching data from the network via repository pattern.

projects.title: ComposeSurveyApp
projects.description: ComposeSurveyApp is a sample survey app, built with Jetpack Compose. The goal of the sample is to showcase text input, validation and state capabilities of Compose.

projects.title: Dynamic App Launcher Icon Demo
projects.description: This project demonstrates how to implement dynamic app launcher icons in Android applications using Jetpack Compose. Popular apps like Swiggy, Zomato, and Twitter use this feature to dynamically change their app icons, enhancing user engagement and branding.

projects.title: RunTrackerApp
projects.description: This app helps you track your location while running or travelling to give you precise details(exact locaions,total distance covered,speed,average speed etc) about your journey and display them in an effective manner.

projects.title: Covid Tracker
projects.description: This app shows covid information from india and all over the globe. This app can help you to be up to date with covid-19 information from any country which you want to see.This app has a separate section for covid information of India.You can go much deep and see information based on districts for every Indian states.

projects.title: PhotoEditorX
projects.description: This is an app which can be used for editing photos.This app gives variety of options for editing your photos however you want.Some editing options are : 1.Edit contrust,brightness,color temperatures. 2.Add photo filters. 3.Add emoji's and frames. 4.Add texts and change styles of your text. 5.Crop,rotate,resize your image. 6.Choose an image from your gallery or take a photo using camera to edit.
